title: The Lion King 3: Hakuna Matata [Blu-ray]
description: The third instalment (which did not have a cinema release) in this popular children's animated story, but this time the story is told from Timon the Meerkat and Pumba the Warthog's perspective. When Timon decides to explore the world, it's not long before his path crosses with that of Pumba and they become good friends. But their plan to find a new home is forgotten when they come across a young cub called Simba (voiced again by Matthew Broderick) and help him save the Serengeti..
details: {"Package Dimensions": "7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.93 Ounces", "Media Format": "Blu-ray"}
